list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Changes to: Almost all. File: Almost all.
* Concluded code cleanup and fixed bugs, - Repainted old buttons (and removed 'Test' from their names), - Added some images for enemies, - Added info on click for enemies in battle, - Added effects for barrier and all 3 passive spells, - Slowed down combat and redesigned combat HUD, * Added victory and defeat screens to combat, * Added Guide book to Room_1, - Added Control settings, - Added Inventory/Stats menu (bound to I), - Item stores are now saved in files, fixing the bug where world objects were not reset upon loading files but on opening the game as stores are the only changeable world objects.
Note: I forgot to mention some changes in the previous push: - Added 4 unique enemies for the field, - Mild re-balancing off spells, - Added combat actions for defend and run.
Note 2: This was meant to be a small push, but I couldn't stop adding new things... If I have the time I might even add more...
This is the last of two concluding pushes for the Demo edition 2022 (except maybe some balancing and bug fixes if I can't stop myself). After this work on Destined will be done mostly offline.

task.summary: Default task
Initial commit

Changes to: Combat, player inventories. File: Battle.py.
- Slow steps towards display of combat. - Adds test images for combat buttons.

Changes to: Combat, player inventories. (2) File: Battle.py.
- Slow steps towards display of combat. - Adds test images for combat buttons.

Changes to: Combat, player inventories. (3) File: Battle.py.
- Steps towards display of combat, - Adds test images for combat buttons, - Combat buttons now display and link up to filler functions.

Changes to: Combat, player inventories, Imports. File: Battle.py, main.py, Enemy_class.py (*_moves.py), Test_room_definitions.py, Core.py.
- Steps towards display of combat, - Adds test images for combat background, - Minor combat function changes, - Complete redesign of import order, with addition of Core.py, - Minor redesign of functions and their locations, - To note: Enemy_moves.py is renamed to Enemy_class.py.
Next will be the addition of spells and enemy turns.

Changes to: Imports, Image folder. File: Battle.py, main.py, Enemy_class.py (*_moves.py), Test_room_definitions.py, images.
- finishing of import order, with addition removal of unnecessary imports(2) - Images hve been put in images folder,
Next will be the addition of spells and enemy turns.

Changes to: Combat, player turns, magic, enemies. File: Spell_definitions.py, Battle.py, Enemy_class.py
- Addition of most spells, - Mass changes to combat, - Final relocation of images,
Next will be the completion of spells and melee combat.

Changes to: melee Combat, spell button images File: Spell_definitions.py, Battle.py
- Minor addition of melee combat, - you can now tell the spells apart, with the addition of unique images.
Next will be the completion of spells and melee combat.

Changes to: melee Combat, spell button images (2) File: Spell_definitions.py, Battle.py
- Actually adds the spell images... - Minor addition of melee combat, - you can now tell the spells apart, with the addition of unique images.
Next will be the completion of spells and melee combat.

Changes to: status effects, magic, combat. File: Spell_definitions.py, Battle.py, Status_effects.py
- Most spells are now entirely functional, - Minor additions to melee combat, - Adds many status effects. - The interactable tile in Room_1 is now a Dummy fight (always available, never-ending).
Next will be the completion of the stamina system from melee combat and the addition of items.

Changes to: magic, combat, items. File: Spell_definitions.py (Action_*), Battle.py,
- Changed file name Spell_definitions.py to Action_definitions.py as it now includes item definitions as well. - Addition of 1 new spell and minor changes to spells and status effects, - Minor additions to stamina systems.
Next will be the completion of the stamina system from melee combat and the addition of most items.

Changes to: magic, combat, items. (2) File: Action_definitions.py, Battle.py,
- Major rewrite of damage system. now takes effects into account. - Spells and melee combat now act via deal_damage function.
Note: Player actions will most likely be scrapped and only the Defend- and Flee-actions will make it into the final product for simplification.
Next is enemy turns and polishing of player turn functions (damage balancing).

Changes to: Battle, enemy moves, images. File: Enemy_class.py, Battle.py,
- Enemies now attack via deal_damage function, - Most actions in battles are now printed for easy tracing. - All potion items now have unique images.
Next is enemy turns and polishing of player turn functions (damage balancing).

Changes to: enemy moves. File: Enemy_class.py, README.md
- Enemies now decide their action witch chances and sequences. - All test enemies are changed due to aforementioned changes to enemy turns. - Item actions can now be traced. - README.md has been updated to suit change of focus.
Note: These changes conclude the combat updates. some minor additions are to be added later, including 2 player Actions and weaponry.
Next are Checkpoints and Save files.

Changes to: Saving to File, Escape menu. File: Menus.py, SaveFile1.txt
- Pressing escape now opens menu with: - Resume function, closes menu - Save function, saves current playerdata to file - load function, loads file to playerdata, coles menu - quit function, calls builtings.exit() - settings function, temporary exit call. - Escape menu cannot be opened in battle. - Images for escape menu have been included.
Next are Checkpoints and multiple Save files.

Changes to: Saving to File. File: Menus.py, SaveFile1-, 2-, 3- .txt
- Added 2 more Save files, - Mild code cleanup, - Fixed bug stopping you from saving after battling.
Next are Checkpoints and the Main menu.

Changes to: Menus, animations, File: Menus.py, main.py, Anim_class.py,
- Added main menu (title screen), - Added experimental settings menu, - Save file 3 now has ludicrous movement speed, - Animations can now be paused, deleted and replayed, - Added more images for special tiles.
Note: An attempt was made to add checkpoints but failed due to import loops.
Next are Checkpoints and the Settings menu.

Changes to: Saving and loading, stores, File: Menus.py, main.py, Append_menus.py,
- Append_menus.py is now added for any menu that adds to player inventories, - Added checkpoints for each room, - Saving and loading files now takes main.py global list rather than its own, - Many minor changes have been made to most files, such as addition of test_foe_2 in Enemy_class.py.
Note: I already have a tool that helps me in designing rooms, but it's very messy. In the coming weeks I'll probably be working on that as well.
Next are stores and maybe keybind settings.

Changes to: Stamina, Weaponry, Death, other, File: Player_class.py, Battle.py, other,
- Added weaponry (5 different items affecting melee combat), - SaveFile1 is now empty, opening this first starts the game at its beginning (which is currently [1, 1] in room_1 without items), - The player now regains stamina at the end of their turn, - Upon death, the player now respawns at last checkpoint with 1/8 of their health, - Code cleanup.
Note: "other" refers to all files in which only minor changes were made for the code cleanup.
Next are a lot more minor additions and polishing. Possibly inventory and shop menus as well.

Changes to: other, File: other,
- Image paths now work on any system (I hope), - Fixed bug that caused misplacement of player after passing through doors, - code cleanup
Note: "other" refers to all files in which only minor changes were made for the code cleanup.
Next are a lot more minor additions and polishing. Possibly inventory and shop menus as well.

Changes to: other, (2) File: other,
- Image paths now work on any system (I hope), - Fixed bug that caused misplacement of player after passing through doors, - code cleanup
Note: "other" refers to all files in which only minor changes were made for the code cleanup.
Next are a lot more minor additions and polishing. Possibly inventory and shop menus as well.

Changes to: Stores, other, File: Append_menus.py, other,
- Fixed bug allowing player to move while in combat, - Added weapon testing, - Removed <l> binding to battle, - Added store function (see G tile in Room_2), - code cleanup.
Note 1: "other" refers to all files in which only minor changes were made for the code cleanup.
Note 2: The tool for creating rooms mentioned a couple pushes ago is now ready for use. I might create a second repo for it once I deem it publish worthy, but as of now it still only has half the functions I want it to have.
Next is creating better visuals and preparing for demo release.

Changes to: All File: All
- Added effect for Staminaless, - Mass code cleanup, - Fixed minor bugs, - Added Menu for Text Display, - Added simple leveling system, - Added Rooms (see Demo_layout.txt for info) - Added many images for buttons, backgrounds enemies and the new rooms.
Note: This is a massive update compared to all previous, mostly due to the code cleanup and demo room additions. My apologies.
This is the larger of two concluding pushes for the Demo edition 2022. After these work on Destined will be done mostly offline.
